29#include "_libdwarf.h"
30
31__RCSID("$NetBSD: dwarf_seterror.c,v 1.3 2016/02/20 02:43:41 christos Exp $");
32ELFTC_VCSID("Id: dwarf_seterror.c 2075 2011-10-27 03:47:28Z jkoshy ");
33
34#define _SET_FIELD(R, F, V) \
35 do { \
36 (R) = (F); \
37 (F) = (V); \
38 } while (/*CONSTCOND*/0)
39
40#define SET_FIELD(D, R, F) \
41 do { \
42 if (D) \
43 _SET_FIELD(R, (D)->dbg_##F, F); \
44 else \
45 _SET_FIELD(R, _libdwarf.F, F); \
46 } while (/*CONSTCOND*/0)
47
48Dwarf_Handler
49dwarf_seterrhand(Dwarf_Debug dbg, Dwarf_Handler errhand)
50{
51 Dwarf_Handler oldhandler;
52
53 SET_FIELD(dbg, oldhandler, errhand);
54
55 return (oldhandler);
56}
57
58Dwarf_Ptr
59dwarf_seterrarg(Dwarf_Debug dbg, Dwarf_Ptr errarg)
60{
61 Dwarf_Ptr oldarg;
62
63 SET_FIELD(dbg, oldarg, errarg);
64
65 return (oldarg);
66}
67
